name: One Duel
description:
This game was made for the Nokia jam 3.

Basic dueling game where you duel against an AI.

You control the person on the left.

Controls:

  • W or UP arrow -- move up 
  • S or DOWN arrow -- move down
  • J or K or SPACE -- shoot

The audio was taken from the Nokia 3310 Sound Pack 2021.zip found here
